title: 通过VS code连接服务器使用Jupyter NoteBook
SPR
text:
import pandas as pd
file_path = r"C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\SO20250331-138&139&141\excels\SPR-tafluprost_acid\RU-Time.xlsx"
RU_Time_df = pd.read_excel(file_path)
RU_Time_df = RU_Time_df.iloc[:2998]

file_path = r"C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\SO20250331-138&139&141\excels\SPR-tafluprost_acid\RU-Time.adj.xlsx"
RU_Time_adj_df = pd.read_excel(file_path)
RU_Time_adj_df = RU_Time_adj_df.iloc[:2998]
RU_Time_df.columns

Index(['Time', '0.39', '0.78', '1.56', '3.13', '6.25', '12.5', '25.0'], dtype='object')



RU_Time_adj_df.columns

Index(['Time', '0.39', '0.78', '1.56', '3.13', '6.25', '12.5', '25.0'], dtype='object')



import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.figure(figsize=(6, 4))

colInfo_dic = {
    "0.39": "#C64A4A",
    "0.78": "#1FB934",
    "1.56": "#3B43D4",
    "3.13": "#6A108E",
    "6.25": "#99931E",
    "12.5": "#8CBD1A",
    "25.0": "#E87F35"
}

for col in RU_Time_df.columns.tolist()[1:][::-1]:
    plt.plot(
        RU_Time_df["Time"],
        RU_Time_df[col],
        color=colInfo_dic[col], alpha=0.6, linestyle='--')

for col in RU_Time_adj_df.columns.tolist()[1:][::-1]:
    plt.plot(
        RU_Time_adj_df["Time"],
        RU_Time_adj_df[col],
        color=colInfo_dic[col], label=str(col) + " μmol")

plt.xlabel('X')
plt.ylabel('Y')
plt.title('XXX')
plt.legend()
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()









import pandas as pd
file_path = r"C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\SO20250331-138&139&141\excels\SPR-tafluprost_acid\RU-Concentration.line.xlsx"
RU_Concentration_line_df = pd.read_excel(file_path)

file_path = r"C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\SO20250331-138&139&141\excels\SPR-tafluprost_acid\RU-Concentration.dot.xlsx"
RU_Concentration_dot_df = pd.read_excel(file_path)

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.figure(figsize=(6, 4))
plt.plot(
    RU_Concentration_line_df['Concentration'],
    RU_Concentration_line_df['RU'])
plt.scatter(
    RU_Concentration_dot_df['Concentration'],
    RU_Concentration_dot_df['RU'],
    c='red', s=6, alpha=0.8)
plt.xlabel('X')
plt.ylabel('Y')
plt.title('XXX')
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

title: SPR
text:
3-feruloylquinic acid

import pandas as pd
file_path = r"C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\SO20250331-138&139&141\excels\SPR-3_feruloylquinic_acid\RU-Time.xlsx"
RU_Time_df = pd.read_excel(file_path)
RU_Time_df = RU_Time_df.iloc[:2885]

tmp_df = RU_Time_df[RU_Time_df["Time"]>=0]

RU_Time_0_df = RU_Time_df[RU_Time_df["Time"]<0]
RU_Time_0_85_df = tmp_df[tmp_df["Time"]<85]
RU_Time_85_df = tmp_df[tmp_df["Time"]>=85]

RU_Time_df.columns

Index(['Time', '1.56', '3.13', '6.25', '12.5', '25.0', '50.0'], dtype='object')



import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.figure(figsize=(6, 4))

colInfo_dic = {
    "1.56": "#C64A4A",
    "3.13": "#1FB934",
    "6.25": "#3B43D4",
    "12.5": "#6A108E",
    "25.0": "#99931E",
    "50.0": "#E87F35"
}

for col in RU_Time_0_df.columns.tolist()[2:][::-1]:
    plt.plot(
        RU_Time_0_df["Time"],
        RU_Time_0_df[col],
        color=colInfo_dic[col], label=col + " μmol")

for col in RU_Time_0_85_df.columns.tolist()[2:][::-1]:
    plt.plot(
        RU_Time_0_85_df["Time"],
        RU_Time_0_85_df[col],
        color=colInfo_dic[col])

for col in RU_Time_85_df.columns.tolist()[2:][::-1]:
    plt.plot(
        RU_Time_85_df["Time"],
        RU_Time_85_df[col],
        color=colInfo_dic[col])

plt.xlabel('X')
plt.ylabel('Y')
plt.title('XXX')
plt.legend()
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()









import pandas as pd
file_path = r"C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\SO20250331-138&139&141\excels\SPR-3_feruloylquinic_acid\RU-Concentration.xlsx"
RU_Concentration_dot_df = pd.read_excel(file_path)

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.figure(figsize=(6, 4))
plt.plot(
    RU_Concentration_line_df['Concentration'],
    RU_Concentration_line_df['RU'])
plt.scatter(
    RU_Concentration_dot_df['Concentration_dot'],
    RU_Concentration_dot_df['RU_dot'],
    c='red', s=6, alpha=0.8)
plt.xlabel('X')
plt.ylabel('Y')
plt.title('XXX')
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

import pandas as pd
file_path = r'C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\SO20250331-138&139&141\excels\ITC-tafluprost_acid.xlsx'
df = pd.read_excel(file_path)   # 只拿需要的两列
df

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.figure(figsize=(6, 4))
plt.plot(
    df["Time (s)"],
    df["Corrected Heat Rate (μJ/s)"]
    )
plt.xlabel('Time (s)')
plt.ylabel('Corrected Heat Rate (μJ/s)')
plt.title('XXX')
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()









import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.figure(figsize=(6, 4))
plt.scatter(
    df["Mole Ratio"],
    df["Enthalpy (kcal/mol)"],
    c='red', s=6, alpha=0.8)
plt.plot(
    df["Mole Ratio.1"],
    df["Fit (kcal/mol)"]
    )
plt.xlabel('Mole Ratio')
plt.ylabel('Enthalpy and Fit (kcal/mol)')
plt.title('XXX')
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
